Item ID1987

Grapes can be produced through planting grape seeds at the Hosidius Vinery, requiring level 36 in Farming and 65% Hosidius favour. They are also dropped in noted form by several bosses.

They are an ingredient for making a jug of wine at level 35 Cooking by using them on a jug of water, which grants 200 Cooking experience when fermented after a short period. If fermentation fails, a jug of bad wine will be created instead. Players stop creating jugs of bad wine when they reach 68 Cooking.

A bunch of grapes is also required for Monkey Madness II.

Locations[edit | edit source]

  • Cooks' Guild
  • Phoenix Gang Hideout (accessible only by members of the Phoenix Gang).
  • The wine stall in Draynor Village (using Thieving).
  • Culinaromancer's Chest (accessible only by starting Recipe for Disaster).

[[File:Grapes detail.png|left|150px]]
'''Grapes''' can be produced through planting [[grape seed]]s at the [[Hosidius]] [[Vinery]], requiring level 36 in [[Farming]] and 65% Hosidius favour. They are also dropped in noted form by several bosses.

They are an ingredient for making a [[jug of wine]] at level 35 [[Cooking]] by using them on a [[jug of water]], which grants 200 Cooking [[experience]] when fermented after a short period. If fermentation fails, a [[jug of bad wine]] will be created instead. Players stop creating jugs of bad wine when they reach 68 Cooking.

A bunch of grapes is also required for [[Monkey Madness II]].
